page.title: 11Irvine Leisure Time Clubs
page.content: We visited{Irvine Burns Club}and found that in an average week the number of clubs which use the building is about nine. They are:{Irvine Burns Club, {Irvine Lassies Burns Club, Irvine {Rotary Club, The Inner Wheel, The {Incorporated Trades, The Ayrshire {Hospice Committee, The Burns {Federation, The Ayrshire Association {of Burns Clubs and the Irvine Operatic {Society.}At their meetings there are talks on Literature, Local History, and Scottish Culture as well as business meetings. Organisations working for charity hold their planning meetings and many fund raising functions there. The building is used most evenings and Saturday afternoons. It provides{a library, a {Burns Museum, the Burgh Museum}and {music room.}Anyone could use the library with permission.
